PageInfo.Message:
<COL 78f5ff>"Personal Quests" are available!</COL>
<COL ffdc78>"Personal Quests"</COL> are
represented by a green icon.
You will know and understand more of Lestania
doing
these quests. They are very important!

A "Personal Quest" will appear as a <COL
ffdc78>"Priority Quest"</COL>
once accepted.
Even if your destination is far away, it will
appear
on the minimap in the upper-right corner of the
screen.
This will help you reach your objectives.

Quest priority can be set in the [<KC
UI_GAME_MENU>] Game Menu,
<COL ffdc78>"Quest Log"</COL> inside the <COL
ffdc78>"Quest"</COL>
main menu.
<COL ffdc78>You can set up to 3 "Priority
Quests".</COL>
If you are progressing through multiple quests at
the same time you should switch quest priority
as needed, so you can easily see the information
that you need.
